item.description:
Do big Mix and Mingles intimidate you? Are you new to Meetup? Do you like meeting interesting new people? The purpose of this event is to make it very easy for you to meet fellow new members in a popular, safe, and intimate setting.

  Do you dislike when parties are too big and you can't even hear? This will be an intimate get together specially for new and newer members of Meetup with a very hassle-free and friendly atmosphere. Only 30 to 50 people from Different Groups that are Interesting in meeting new people.

  Discover what Meetups are about. Meet interesting new people.

  Sip some refreshing spirits at the bar. Discover a popular Boston bar.

  This event is Only $5. Please have a $5 bill handy when you walk in.


  Intimate (Only 30 to 50 people in Private Room)

  Don't miss this hassle-free celebration, ! :)

  Jeff

  Sponsored by:

  The Boston Volunteers
  Big enough to deliver, small enough to care
  Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have the private room exclusively for us.
item.name: New Meetup Members! Hassle-Free Celebration for you!
